name: Space Thugs Infinity
description:
You are traveling through an infinite hyper-conduit in space when all of the sudden wave after wave of Space Thugs attack you.  To make matters worse, the conduit is full of asteroids that explode into smaller asteroid fragments.  You take damage if an enemy ship, enemy laser, or asteroid touches your ship.  Asteroids explode when they touch your ship so watch out for the fragments they leave behind!

Stay tuned for the credits if you beat the Space Thug boss.  Those explode too!

Best enjoyed in full screen mode.

Controls

ShootSpace or Left Mouse Button*MoveMouse or Trackpad

* TIP: Rapidly tap on shoot for power attack.  Hold shoot for automatic attack.

Known Issues:
Tracking scripts from itch.io appear to run afoul of Safari's third party tracking policy.  If you run into to problems with Safari try disabling this feature.

Safari > Preferences > Privacy > [uncheck] Prevent cross-site tracking

Alternatively, use Chrome or Firefox.
